alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 13 at 2:42PM EST until December 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Significant ice accumulation on power lines and tree limbs may cause power outages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
